transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello
Executive: Haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Haan namaste sir, mai kya computer se bol raha tha.
Executive: Ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Sir mere ko ek issue aa raha tha ki kal maine ek naya isme wo khola tha ki standard wala rehta hai na sir isme.
Haan
Customer: Jo latest standard show karta hai na apne by list me jate hai apan.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Sir maine kya kal do line pe dekhe the views pe ja ke usme aage the you have successfully this standard.
Executive: Aapke mail pe aapke mail pe gaya tha wo mail pe dekha tha check kiya tha aapne.
Customer: Accha mail check nahi kare mail pe jata hai kya sir ye.
Executive: Mail pe ha mail pe jata hai mail pe waha se aapko rights milegi waha pe aap usko jo hai form wagera fill kar sakte hai aap.
Customer: Accha abhi aap office me nahi hai kya sir.
Executive: Kijiye ek baar view tender karne ke baad mail pe check kijiye ek baar aap.
Customer: Chalo mai ek baar check kar leta hu. Hmm baki aaj sir office bhi band bhi hai aaj.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issue with new tender.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to check mail for rights.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check his mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tender, mail, rights, office
